## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5305ed5a8b702f1ebff37fd77c6a498586782cc76fa0f351f18c6ad13efdd194)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'heft-web-rig-library-tutorial' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
